name: Shoot The Birds With Your Crossbow Free - A Complete Hunting Day
name_original: Shoot The Birds With Your Crossbow Free - A Complete Hunting Day
description:
Shoot as many birds as you can before the sun sets, the more you hit the more time you have before that big sun sets in the sky!

Shoot The Birds has a fun arrow shooting mechanic as well as a cool day to night transition sequence in place of a timer.

Features:
-Great Sound and Music
-Cute Graphics
-Addictive Gameplay

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
